document_data.name: ''Consuming Darkness''
document_data.mainbody: spite being made of [[gold]], the ring appeared as if a completely black silhouette, shedding or reflecting no light at all.
document_data.Description: Despite being made of [[gold]], the ring appeared as if a completely black silhouette, shedding or reflecting no light at all.
document_data.Powers: ''Consuming Darkness'' granted the wearer an increased ability in the fields of discombobulating and assassinating their targets.
document_data.History: The ring was taken from the treasury of the [[Shadovar]] Archwizard [[Amskar]]'s [[Amskar's enclave|flying glacier enclave]] by [[Cormyr]]ean forces as they attacked it. The battle destroyed the enclave and the army upon it, but ''Consuming Darkness'' was one of the treasures recovered intact.
